Title (required): Type: Short description (#issue-number)
Example: Feature: Add user authentication (#42)

Summary
- What does this PR change? Why?

Related Issue
- Closes #<number>

Type of Change
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Bugfix
- [ ] Release
- [ ] Hotfix
- [ ] Documentation

Checklist
- [ ] Code compiles and tests pass locally
- [ ] CI checks pass
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
